item.title: CVE-2024-4323|2024-05-20T12:06:21.696Z -- Fluent Bit -- Fluent Bit
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability in Fluent Bit versions 2.0.7 thru 3.0.3. This issue lies in the embedded http serverâ€™s parsing of trace requests and may result in denial of service conditions, information disclosure, or remote code execution.
